album.title: How to Dismantle an Atomic Bomb

wiki.content:
'Sometimes you can't make it on your own' was written by lead singer Bono as a tribute to his father, Bob Hewson, who died in 2001; Bono sang this at his funeral. The video to the song begins with a note from Bono about his father, saying "I wish I'd known him better."
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.

track.name: Sometimes You Can't Make It On Your Own
